doc.arg: Interface to access the user interface for sharing items
Interface to access the user interface for sharing items.
Method called to launch the user interface for sharing items for the selected items

The sharing application accepts a list of items. Each item can be something like Tracker IRI of a file, Data URI or File URI of a file indexed by tracker.
The methods listed above are the items supported by the default sharing methods. Future extensions might add new item formats to the supported list.
If the given item is not understood by the share method, it will be ignored and no error will be provided.
